TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi TreeViewItem extends System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl implements class System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo
Public Class TreeViewItem Inherits HeaderedItemsControl Implements IHierarchicalVirtualizationAndScrollInfo

summary.span: 实现 控件中的可选择项。

span.span: Implements a selectable item in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，这意味着其标头和对象的集合可以是任何类型 （如字符串、 图像或面板）。 is a , which means its header and collection of objects can be of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. 控件可以嵌入在其他控件创建层次结构内的节点控件。 controls can be embedded inside other controls to create a hierarchy of nodes inside a control. 下图显示的层次结构控件内。The following illustration shows a hierarchy of controls inside a . ![TreeView 图](~/add/media/treeviewillustration.JPG "TreeView 图")![TreeView illustration](~/add/media/treeviewillustration.JPG "TreeView illustration") 若要展开或折叠，使用属性。To expand or collapse a , use the property. 有关详细信息控制，请参阅[TreeView 概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-overview.md)。For more information about the control, see the [TreeView Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-overview.md). ## 自定义 TreeViewItem 控件Customizing the TreeViewItem Control 若要将相同的属性设置应用于多个控件，使用属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 你可以修改默认提供独特外观的控件。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的部件和特定于状态，请参阅[TreeView 样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [TreeView Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-styles-and-templates.md). 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 设置 visual 属性会仅造成影响该属性是否都存在于控件的默认模板，并通过设置。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 可以在的"更改 Visual 结构的控件"一节中找到的可视属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建的层次结构中控制控件。The following example shows how to create a hierarchy of controls in a control. [!code-xaml[TreeViewSnips#EmbeddedTVIs](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TreeViewSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml#embeddedtvis)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何查找所选并展开它和它的所有子项。The following examples show how to find the selected and expand it and all of it child items. 以下[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]创建并使用一些数据填充它。The following [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] creates a and populates it with some data. [!code-xaml[TreeViewExpand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/treeviewexpand/csharp/mainwindow.xaml#1)] 下面的代码遍历查找所选，然后调用以显示所选的所有子项目。The following code traverses the to find the selected and then calls to display all child items of the selected . > [!NOTE] > `GetTreeViewItem`方法仅适用于未虚拟化的控件。The `GetTreeViewItem` method only works for controls that are not virtualized. 若要了解如何查找这可能是虚拟化，请参阅[如何： 在树视图中查找 TreeViewItem](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-find-a-treeviewitem-in-a-treeview.md)。To learn how to find a that may be virtualized, see [How to: Find a TreeViewItem in a TreeView](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-find-a-treeviewitem-in-a-treeview.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果鼠标为 2 的值属性切换到`true`或`false`，这将导致以展开或折叠。If the mouse is two, the value of the property switches to `true` or `false`, which causes the to expand or collapse. 此实现将标记事件处理的设置属性的事件数据的`true`。This implementation marks the event as handled by setting the property of the event data to `true`.

para.span: 如果你重写，始终调用基实现你实现。

span.span: If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation.

para.span: 如果调用基实现会使基类处理具有类处理程序，这可能会改变最终类的运行时行为的事件。

span.span: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.

para.span: 你可以调用基实现之前或之后你特殊的处理，具体取决于你的要求。

span.span: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生时选择从这更改到另一个中控件。The event occurs when the selection changes from this to another in a control. 此事件与中的更改时将发生的事件属性控件。This event is related to the event that occurs when there is a change in the property of a control. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何分配的事件处理程序事件，以及如何定义事件处理程序。The following example shows how to assign an event handler for the event to a , and how to define the event handler.
